title: Talking Back - main point in fourth paragraph

content.question: Which of the following best expresses the author's main point in the fourth paragraph?

choices.label: The views of some feminists appear surprisingly sexist when analyzed in detail.
The experience of Black women must be distinguished from that of White women.
The theoretical arguments of scholars have little impact on events in the real world.
Black women view themselves as powerful figures within their communities.

content.answer: The experience of Black women must be distinguished from that of White women.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
